Introduction

SPICA.S was a sub-unit of the girl group SPICA. Composed of four members: Park Si Hyun, Park Na Rae, Yang Ji Won, and Kim Bo Hyung, they released their debut single, "Give Your Love?" on September 12, 2014.

Current state:
disbanded
